documents.document: @ColeyTangerina Maybe I'm showing my privilege - but I felt like anyone could wear anything at the marches. Which was kinda the point.
@ColeyTangerina Photos I've seen have shown marches to be hugely open, kind & totally inclusive. Huge solidarity against all discrimination?
@PhillipsTane All the people still doing their NY's resolutions!
@LewisHoldenNZ I guess, a very high price to pay and certainly not tearing any part of our movement I know apart. Bigger fish n all that
@LewisHoldenNZ not really. We've kind of got our hands full with, like, all the hatred. Low blow much on such a shitty day?
Great news - Jacinda is fantastic! https://t.co/QuKHRzfT9d
Have just realised I am quite sensitive to noise. Mother of two kids under four. Too fucking late, as my mother would say.
@philquin @KeirLeslie @BeeFaerie ok, it is hard in that format to make every point be exact & precise. I get that.
@philquin @KeirLeslie @BeeFaerie but not clarifying that the common language included elected reps? C'mon now
@philquin @KeirLeslie @BeeFaerie it just feels like you'd like the meme / semi-truth to continue
@philquin @KeirLeslie @BeeFaerie sure, but also up to you about whether you want to perpetuate the meme that the process is about "HO".
@philquin @KeirLeslie @BeeFaerie (apologies in advance for being so shit on twitter!)
@philquin @KeirLeslie @BeeFaerie language, don't you think?
@philquin @KeirLeslie @BeeFaerie elected by members who know this is one of the most NB roles they play. Quite important to be clear in our
@philquin @KeirLeslie @BeeFaerie interchangeably but most often in a derogatory sense cf to 'faceless' HO. Whereas NZC reps on panels are
@philquin @KeirLeslie @BeeFaerie i think it's quite NB to distinguish bt the roles of HO and NZ Council. Phil's right they're often used
@haydenwilsonnz but also, so flipping funny!!
@taylorsays_ hope you got your walk this arvo! Peach of a day in the end!
@Independent @indy100 you don't have to defend anything to me, lovely mum! You're wonderful and this is your way! Those kids faces in am!!!
@taylorsays_ on the bright side, southerly has chased the horrid weather away and we in for some fine welly days. But yeah the bumps r yuck!
@TheCLASSYKiddo *blush*! Means a lot from you! gonna #changethegovt next year so all got to be sparkly! See you next year
@TheCLASSYKiddo merry Xmas!
@TheCLASSYKiddo have fun though! Love Samoa! You need a good break before next year!
@jimmyjack888 how awesome, shows how important your work is to ppl! Compassion goes a long way x
Three fantastic candidates selected for @nzlabour this week https://t.co/wMtEHXDg48
I'll miss @annetterongotai being the MP for our fab electorate, but admire her reason v much. Thanks for all your work Annette, v grateful.
Enjoyed @DavidShearerMP's valedictory tonight, esp the reminder that MPs are humans too! Go well Dave. No doubt you'll do us proud!
@reedfleming @ginnyandersen @priyanca02 thank you for your help for our campaigns! You're the best!
@michaelwoodnz lots of us still hold hope for light rail up through Newtown to the airport. Would be amazing
@jimmyjack888 totally understand! See you next time (hopefully before!)
@jimmyjack888 Missed you today!
This is so great. Would be really great if we could stop the parent-judging! https://t.co/i2ojoYBnlk
@DearMama_ my boy's kindy teachers are the ppl I trust most. We can also work together after coming up with strategies
@PhillipsTane easy as! See you Saturday!
@PhillipsTane great to spend time with you today tane! Onward to victory
@SeanDG @Independent that hotline gonna run so hot!
@Andr3wCampbell any time! Just let me know x
@Andr3wCampbell do you need a place to stay? Couch here brother
@JulianRobins also met your sister in my campaign travels! Great convo had over a drink in Dunedin. We should get old gang together soon too
@JulianRobins lol, I was of course referring to that other important election!
I'm feeling a little more resilient after this awful week, and here's a perfect antidote to the attempt to silence… https://t.co/mWnlV6LE04
@robbdj @nzlabour thanks Deb. A huge privilege
@drsapna aw hope you guys have a great weekend - I've been away so much lately, just need to be home with family for a bit
@reedfleming thank you!!
@SeanDG @metiria oh my! That's my home. So beautiful. Thank you!
Wellingtonians: please buy books from John at our own kids bookshop in kilbirnie! Don't want to lose that great wee… https://t.co/s8ZcluuxxV
@IBCycleWay @nzpolice @gredge @NZTAAkl or even some of those council dudes that walk around the city on bikes? Cheaper; we have them already
@IBCycleWay @nzpolice @gredge @NZTAAkl now that's a blimmin good idea!!!
@JMaKiwi all 4 folks are boomers & all but 1 fit cliche. Husband's Ma is brill, but other 3 like theory of being grandps more than reality!
@JMaKiwi the life of gen x'er with baby boomer parents. Sigh. Hear ya
@ToddAtticus my fave is the electorate vote grant. But that's just me!
Progressive Welly voters: Polls are tight, please vote for @justin_lester & get all your whanau too. https://t.co/q4vFbDDDqK
I can't wait to start reading RD to my children. He made me so happy as a kid. Happy birthday! https://t.co/QcNWPLwJOC
I know who I'm voting for, but then I expect my mayor to give a little more than one word answers. #lesterformayor https://t.co/IQTx0Avlsf
@DearMama_ @duncangreive @FlickElectricCo @TheSpinoffTV mean it! A laugh goes a long way some days as you well know! & someone getting it!
@duncangreive @FlickElectricCo @DearMama_ @TheSpinoffTV Emily is a fantastic voice for parents. We love her. Saved parent meltdowns heaps!
Mr Borchard, because he listened to us & let us be ourselves #BestTeacherEver!
David Coats quoting our own Norman Kirk #futureofworkNZ https://t.co/M14aWU10HO
@SamHuggard @SharanBurrow this is the crucial question across our movement and in our progressive parties!
Hey @CCDHB, our boy had an op at your hospital yesterday & your staff were incredible to him & us, every single one! Thank you. V grateful
This week I was inspired by @FleurFitzsimons - lawyer for worker & human rights, activist, mum #WomanCrushWednesdays https://t.co/rlRvjYyKEB
@jo_moir did it used to be the messengers' maybe?
@LI_politico if you have a track record of these things, please can you go to bed now?! No offence
@reedfleming when do you get bread and when do you get a roll? Regional?
@juliefairey solidarity sister, such BS people do that. Take care
@RussellClarkNZ same and mainly it's coz I don't have cash and sometimes they do it anyway in welly!
@hollyrwalker I can imagine. I often wonder how this could affect the psyche of MPs. Horrible situation
@hollyrwalker I can't stop thinking about her kids. In and out of tears this morning. Husbands words about enveloping them in love, so sad
@jimmyjack888 lovely ladies! Congrats
@owrwegiei @IBCycleWay the level of debate in IB on this issue has been anything but healthy. All I saw was insults & name-calling. V sad
@owrwegiei @IBCycleWay Not so much pro cyclist, just pro sharing and healthy debate rather than the disgusting rhetoric we've seen from anti
@IBCycleWay the thing is: all users can see, slow down or stop for each other! The road is now friendlier for all users. We need to share
@MorganGodfery some ppl@also take a position & feel they can't change their minds cause they've backed themselves into a corner. A shame
@rorymccourt That's right - people also have a right to know what they're voting for. Mature MMP thinking.
History shows Labour's vote goes up when its clear about partnership #changethegovernment https://t.co/Q9nZ4AXpR4
@ruthdysonmp YES PLEASE! #changethegovernment
"It's time for change" @AndrewLittleMP. Yay!! #labourgreens
If it was a dad who took eyes off his kid at the zoo for a moment, he wouldn't have faced half the hate that mum has. Sick of anti-mum shit
My feels exactly https://t.co/C6Vy2PLK5J
@RussellClarkNZ welcome to welly! What is the new job?
200 ppl came to @justin_lester's fundraiser last night, only half of them the 'usual suspects'. Reason 501 to support: brings ppl together!
Great way to look at IB cycle way survey results https://t.co/FcIcaBW057
A place that's very part of me https://t.co/TQaG4u9lry
Men boycotting all male panels isn't the full solution, but a great thing men can do. @GenderAvenger. https://t.co/vUaVltrajq
@avancenz @Omearanz @janepatterson @MutchJessica @LeeTaylorNZ fantastic job! Well done to you all!
@DearMama_ omfg. Give us all a fucking break.
Thanks for all your work Campbo! You truly are one of nz's best. Sure you'll be snapped up! x https://t.co/U5GS5mia9k
@ToddAtticus oh dear! Thank goodness you didn't go about like that all day!
@DearMama_ @kiri_te_karnage obv not Peppa pig but lots of the other shows on kid zone
@DearMama_ @kiri_te_karnage um, doesn't stuff that gets NzOA funding need to be on publicly available tv? What about kids w no 'net?
@SparkNZ Eventually got through last night after two attempts and asking for a ring back. Not particularly satisfying. Busy isn't an excuse
Omg @SparkNZ. An hour to talk to someone on the phone and 30 minutes to use your chat service!
@reedfleming horrible.
This is gross people. Seriously? https://t.co/ZdpGFYX9z1
@IBCycleWay @pablogl yeah Pablo, I can. Where is it? I can't tell from the vid sorry
@SamHuggard @docperrin you're too kind. All the doc's work. I bought the roti!
@TedTedwin which protest?
@reedfleming wow, she's brave. If Angus & Lewis did that to me, I'd be 'nup'
Sorry can't make your launch tonight @rtoomath! Have a great time. Loved the N&S article! Dr K will get me a copy tonight!
@SamHuggard @JheneAiko yum! Except the lion brown!
